dr.evomodel.speciation
Class RandomLocalYuleModel

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.evomodel.speciation.SpeciationModel
          dr.evomodel.speciation.UltrametricSpeciationModel
              dr.evomodel.speciation.RandomLocalYuleModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
TreeTraitProvider, Units, RandomLocalTreeVariable, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TaxonRichnessBirthDeathModel
public class RandomLocalYuleModel
extends UltrametricSpeciationModel
implements TreeTraitProvider, RandomLocalTreeVariable

This class contains methods that describe a Yule speciation model whose rate of birth changes at different points in the tree.

Author:
Alexei Drummond
See Also:
Serialized Form

logTreeProbability

public final double logTreeProbability(int taxonCount)
Description copied from class: UltrametricSpeciationModel
"fixed" part of likelihood. Guaranteed to be called before any logNodeProbability calls for one evaluation of the tree.

Specified by:

Parameters:

Returns:
